article.title: Trace Systems Provides IT Support Services in Afghanistan
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Trace Systems, McLean, Va., was awarded a $6,953,728 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price, option-filled contract to procure information technology support services in Afghanistan. The cumulative total face value of this contract is $21,225,120. The U.S. Central Command, Joint Theater Support Contracting Command, Bagram, Afghanistan, is the contracting activity.
